title: Intern Management Web App
description: A responsive web application to manage interns. Features include real-time form validation, full CRUD operations, and a connected backend database.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: Developed a structured online learning platform with user registration, course access, profile management, assessments, progress tracking, and certifications.

title: SafeHaven
description: SafeHaven is a supportive online space for people facing bullying. It allows users to find resources, report bullying incidents, and share their stories.

title: Conference Event Planner
description: A web app built with React to help organize and plan conferences, including schedule management and speaker tracking.

title: E-Plant Shopping Site
description: A React-based e-commerce platform for selling medicinal herbal plants, featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and order handling.
